definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: Saturday was the representative work of periodicals of civil literature in early Minguo.
sentences.chinese: 《禮拜六》是民國初年市民文學期刊的代表作。

sentences.english: MR. YAMAMOTO: Saturday is our busy day at the store.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜六是店裏最忙的一天。

sentences.english: It's Saturday. I have to be in the store.
sentences.chinese: 今天是禮拜六，我必須到店裏去。

sentences.english: Saturday morning came, and all the summer world was bright and fresh.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜六的早晨來了，整個夏日世界，一片璀璨鮮豔。

sentences.english: Then, one Saturday, I decided to take him to a cafe for a soft drink.
sentences.chinese: 後來有一個禮拜六，我決定帶他去咖啡店喝點飲料。

sentences.english: I love sleeping on Saturdays and I love college football games.
sentences.chinese: 我愛在禮拜六睡覺，我愛大學足球比賽。

sentences.english: Yeah, actually, we cruised to Tamshui to see the sunset on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 對啊，其實，我們禮拜六開車兜到淡水去看夕陽。

sentences.english: I’d like to make a reservation for this Saturday evening.
sentences.chinese: 我這個禮拜六晚上想訂張桌位。

sentences.english: Put me down for three tickets for Saturday's performance.
sentences.chinese: 給我登記購買三張禮拜六的演出票。

sentences.english: He spent every Saturday morning working in an animal hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他把每個禮拜六上午花在動物醫院上。

sentences.english: Come to Central Park on Saturday and enjoy food from all over the world. Delicious and not expensive.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜六來中心花園這有來自世界各地的食物。

sentences.english: Would you like to play racquetball this Saturday morning?
sentences.chinese: 禮拜六早上去打壁球吧。

sentences.english: Finish it by Saturday or else have someone else finish it for you.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜六前把它做完，否則讓別人替你做完。

sentences.english: That lady-killer picks up new girls every Saturday night.
sentences.chinese: 阿誰帥哥每個禮拜六晚上都找分歧的新女孩約會。

sentences.english: One Saturday evening some girls boiled a chicken in a small pan.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜六的晚上，同學們用小鐵鍋煮着雞子。

sentences.english: They will stay here until next Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 他們將在這裏待到下禮拜六。

definition: to study outside of class time (reviewing one's lessons)/to study in one's free time/individual study
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
Yangshuo county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
